name: Celeste Classic C++ Port
description:
this is a port of Pico 8  Celeste Classic  by Matt Thorson & Noel Berry to C++

Keys:

MOVE - ARROWS or WASD

ACTION: Z,X or LMB and RMB

IN-GAME PAUSE: ESC or P

Reach me on Twitter: @NOPtheJMP

---------------------------------------------------------

Rendered Using:

Pixel Game Engine - https://github.com/OneLoneCoder/olcPixelGameEngine

Uses Sdl 2 for Audio

Compiled with emscripten!

@Bispoo 2021
